name: Street Rat IX (A Tirenian Story)
description:
Episode nine of a continuing story about a street rat in the city of Fiumenze. Ratto, Piccino and the crew go to meet the goddess Urbina, and run into someone from Ratto's past.

Set in the D&D campaign world Dragons of Tirenia http://tirenia.blogspot.com/

Episode One is here: https://skybeargames.itch.io/street-rat

Episode Two is here: https://skybeargames.itch.io/street-rat-ii

Episode Three is here: https://skybeargames.itch.io/street-rat-iii

Episode Four is here: https://skybeargames.itch.io/street-rat-iv

Episode Five is here: https://skybeargames.itch.io/street-rat-v

Episode Six is here: https://skybeargames.itch.io/street-rat-vi

Episode Seven is here: https://skybeargames.itch.io/street-rat-vii

Episode Eight is here: https://skybeargames.itch.io/street-rat-viii

Thank you to Adam Le Doux for making Bitsy,  ayolland for Borksy and Sean S LeBlanc for the hacks, and all the lovely people who write tutorials and other hacks on here and Discord.
